title: RaceFace Lock-On Grippler Grips
features: Package dimensions: 2.590 cms L x 12.7 cms W x 20.32 cms H
description: The colours you want, the grip you deserve. Grippler gives you the moisture shedding, long gripping sensation you crave, with the hard wearing resilence you expect from Race Face. Our proprietary compound feels great with both gloves and bare hands - and with ramped grip profile on finger side plus varied grip depth on palm side, Grippler will bring you to a higher level of digitization. Available now in 10 colors, and two sizes, the Grippler surpasses industry standards for gripabilty. And now with double Lock-on's, the Grippler even grips itself. Get a grip, with the Grippler.
